title: Coliseo Eduardo Dibos
text: The Coliseo Eduardo Dibos is a multi-propose <a href="arena">indoor arena</a> located in <a href="San%20Borja%20District">San Borja</a>, <a href="Lima">Lima</a>, <a href="Peru">Peru</a>, exactly between Angamos Ave. and Aviacion Ave. The arena has a capacity for 4,600 people. This arena is used to host sport events as <a href="volleyball">volleyball</a> and <a href="basketball">basketball</a>, also many other secondary sports. It is also used for circus events and Bugs Bunny on Ice in August 2006. The Dibos Coliseum, with the <a href="Coliseo%20Mariscal%20Caceres">Coliseo Mariscal Caceres</a>, are the most important venues for non-<a href="association%20football">football</a> sports in Lima. This venue also hosts concerts as in 1994 the <a href="Gaitan%20Castro">Gaitan Castro</a> brothers were the first Peruvian artists to sell out the arena for a concert. A boxing event sold out featuring the <a href="World%20Boxing%20Association">WBA</a> world champion <a href="Kina%20Malpartida">Kina Malpartida</a> and Halana Dos Santos on 20 June 2009. It was remodeled to house the venue in the <a href="3x3%20basketball">3x3 basketball</a> and the traditional 5x5 <a href="basketball">basketball</a> competitions at the <a href="2019%20Pan%20American%20Games">2019 Pan American Games</a>.
